title: Homebrew ABV Estimator

seo.title: Homebrew ABV Calculator | Estimate Alcohol by Volume
seo.description: Estimate ABV from original and final gravity for your beer, cider, or mead batches.

summary: Quick ABV estimate from OG/FG for homebrewers.
formula: const abv = Math.max((og - fg) * 131.25, 0); return { abv };

faq.q: Is this the same as a lab measurement?
faq.a: No, it is a standard brewing estimate. Lab tests are more accurate.
